entries.title: Pamela Anderson and Liam Neeson Reveal Their 'Cuddle Monster' Levels
entries.content: Pamela Anderson and Liam Neeson brought their flourishing love to a new stage. The couple — who star in the new film The Naked Gun together — appeared on the Sunday, August 3, episode of Watch What Happens Live With Andy Cohen. Quizzed by host Andy Cohen, 57, over their individual “cuddle monster” l...

entries.title: Hailey Bieber shares a rare photo of son Jack as she gives an insight into summer after admitting she 'struggled to accept' the surprise pregnancy
entries.content: The model, 28, who shares Jack Blues with her husband Justin, welcomed the tot last August and revealed last week it was 'unexpected.'
